extension.summary: View a Foscam HD camera live stream and monitor motion and sound alarms
extension.description: This script shows the video feed from up to 4 Foscam HD cameras simultaneously.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on is not affiliated with Foscam. This add-on will modify some settings on the camera itself such as motion and sound detection settings.
